text: Family of couple allegedly killed by ex speaks out: 'She just had to get away from him' - ABC News
Trump administration sends letter wiping out addiction, mental health grants - NPR
fullText: The Trump administration sent hundreds of letters Tuesday terminating federal grants supporting mental health and drug addiction services. The cuts could total as much as $2 billion.

text: US reducing personnel at Qatar air base, official tells CBS - BBC
fullText: Officials say it is a "precautionary measure" and comes as Donald Trump weighs up whether to take action against Iran.

text: ISS astronaut medical evacuation latest news: Crew-11 astronauts to undock from station - Space
fullText: Wednesday, Jan. 14, 2026: Updates on NASA's astronaut medical evacuation from the International Space Station.

text: The 5 Deadliest Heart Conditions in America Today — and Their Biggest Risk Factors - Money Talks News
fullText: A new report reveals that progress against heart disease has stalled while key risk factors continue to climb.

text: Citigroup tops estimates as loan loss provisions come in lighter than expected - CNBC
fullText: Under CEO Jane Fraser, Citigroup is in the midst of a restructuring, selling off parts of its overseas operations.

text: Bafta Rising Star Award: Chase Infiniti, Miles Caton and Robert Aramayo among nominees - BBC
fullText: Chase Infiniti, Miles Caton and Robert Aramayo are among the nominees for the Bafta Rising Star Award.

text: Amateur stuns Sinner on way to 1 Point Slam win - ESPN
fullText: Sydney amateur Jordan Smith beat defending Australian Open champion Jannik Sinner on his way to claiming the $1 million Australian first prize at the Australian Open's 1 Point Slam.

text: Despite Trump warning, Iran shopkeeper Erfan Soltani among many facing possible hanging - CBS News
fullText: Iranian shopkeeper Erfan Soltani is among thousands of people who could face death sentences despite Trump's warning to Iran's rulers.

text: Trump administration says Venezuela has released jailed US citizens - BBC
fullText: A US state department official did not confirm the identities or number of prisoners released, but called the move "an important step in the right direction".

text: LA 2028 Olympics to open ticket raffle - with seats starting at $28 - BBC
fullText: If chosen via the draw, fans will be notified via email and will be given a time slot to purchase tickets in April.

text: How have prices changed in a year? NPR checked 114 items at Walmart - NPR
fullText: We found the effects of tariffs and extreme weather, relief (finally!) in the egg cooler, plus one case of shrinkflation.

text: How the feud between Trump and Minnesota is impacting the probe into the ICE shooting - NPR
fullText: The FBI is solely leading the inquiry into the killing of Renee Macklin Good by ICE agent Jonathan Ross without help from Minnesota authorities. Legal experts explain why the move is unusual and why joint investigations are the norm.

text: Why this legal expert says the Minnesota and Illinois immigration lawsuits ‘are close to completely meritless’ - CNN
fullText: Illinois and Minnesota sued the Trump administration over its immigration crackdown. But they have a tough road ahead of them in court, one legal analyst says.

text: Android 17 leak shows Google may fix one UI mistake and double down on another - Android Authority
fullText: A new leak shows what Android 17's split Quick Settings/Notifications UI could look like on foldables, and the comeback of a fan-favorite feature.

text: Trump makes obscene gesture, mouths expletive at Detroit factory heckler - The Washington Post
fullText: A cellphone video captured Trump twice mouthing “f--- you” and raising his middle finger toward a line worker shouting at him inside the Ford factory.

text: Steve Bisciotti Wants Lamar Jackson to Be Involved in Coach Hiring - Ravens Home | Baltimore Ravens – baltimoreravens.com
fullText: Ravens Owner Steve Bisciotti said he will fly with Lamar Jackson from Florida to meet the coaching finalists.

text: Anthony Davis is not expected to need surgery on his hand - NBA
fullText: Anthony Davis (hand) will be sidelined about 6 weeks, but the 10-time All-Star won’t need surgery to repair ligament damage.

text: South Korea's special prosecutor seeks death penalty for ex-President Yoon over martial law bid - CNBC
fullText: If Yoon is sentenced to death, it will be the first execution South Korea has carried out in almost 30 years.
